author: Greg Allen
title: Ryan Routh, charged with trying to assassinate Trump, asks to have charges dropped
description: Ryan Routh is accused of the 2024 assassination attempt of Donald Trump as the then-presidential candidate was golfing at his course in West Palm Beach, Fla. Routh has pleaded not guilty.
